screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .pdsprj file in Labcenter Electronics Proteus 8
screenshot.caption: PDSPRJ file open in Labcenter Electronics Proteus 8

description: The PDSPRJ file is the main file type associated with Proteus. It replaced the .DSN file type. However, you can still open DSN files in Proteus by selecting File → Import Legacy Project .
To open a PDSPRJ file in Proteus, select "Open Project" in the "Start" section in the Home page of Proteus. You can also select File → New Project .
To create a PDSPRJ file in Proteus, select "New Project" in the "Start" section in the Home page of Proteus. Then, select File → Save Project .

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pdsprj file in Labcenter Electronics Proteus 8
images.caption: PDSPRJ file open in Labcenter Electronics Proteus 8
